title: vrsn config file
description: configuration file to set default options for vrsn commands.

verbose.description: If you want to show verbose output when running vrsn commands.

commit.description: If the bump command should automatically commit the edited version file.

commit-msg.description: The commit message to use when the bump command commits the version file.

git-tag.description: If the bump command should use git tags rather than a version file.

tag-msg.description: The message to use when adding the git tag.

base-branch.description: The name of the base branch if it's anything other than main.
